title: Support me by voting!

description.1: It's like giving us money without giving any money! Support us with a [quick vote on top.gg]({url}), it allows people to find {name} more easily, thank you for your support!
description.2: Voting for me will allow you access to some higher limits in some places and a [voter role in our community server]({url}) for the next 12 hours!

already: Você já votou hoje, tente novamente em {time}!
